    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AnswerQuestionCommand
    Command that asks the game engine to accept and process an answer for the current question.
    Builder
    Generic builder interface for constructing `Question` instances.
    CategoryManager
    Manages categories and the mapping of category names to question lists.
    ConsoleIO
    Abstraction for console-based input/output used by the application.
    ConsoleScanner
    Simple ConsoleIO implementation that uses `java.util.Scanner` to read user input from standard in and writes to standard out.
    CSVParserAdaptee
    CSV parser implementation that reads questions from a CSV file and builds Question instances using the QuestionBuilder.
    EnterPlayerNameCommand
    Command used during setup to capture a player's name and add it to the GameInitialization instance.
    EventLogHelper
    In-memory event log collector used during gameplay to record actions.
    ExitGameCommand
    Command that exits the current game by delegating to `Gameplay.exitGame()`.
    FileParser
    Public parsing interface used by the application.
    GameCommand
    Simple command interface used by the game invoker.
    GameEngine
    Core game engine that tracks players, categories, questions and scores.
    GameInitialization
    Holds temporary state during game setup (player count and names).
    GameInvoker
    Central invoker used to execute game commands and record event logs.
    Gameplay
    Orchestrates the gameplay loop: loading questions, player setup, turn execution and graceful shutdown (report + event log generation).
    GameTermination
    Responsible for finalizing game outputs such as report and event log files.
    GenerateEventLogCommand
    Command that triggers generation of the persistent event log file using the provided EventLogHelper instance.
    GenerateReportCommand
    Command to generate the final textual gameplay report using GameTermination.
    JSONParserAdaptee
    JSON parser implementation that reads an array of question objects and converts them to Question instances via the QuestionBuilder.
    LoadFileCommand
    Command that triggers loading of question data from a file into the QuestionManager.
    LogHelper
    Small utility for producing timestamp strings used in log entries.
    Main
    Application entry point for the Jeopardy game.
    ParserAdaptee
    Low-level parser interface for a specific file format.
    ParserAdapter
    Adapter that selects the appropriate concrete parser implementation based on the file extension and exposes a uniform `FileParser` interface.
    Player
    Represents a player in the Jeopardy game with id, name and score.
    Question
    Immutable value object representing a single quiz question.
    QuestionBuilder
    Builder for creating `Question` instances.
    QuestionManager
    Loads and holds the set of `Question` objects for the game.
    ReportHelper
    Helper responsible for building a textual report of gameplay.
    SelectCategoryCommand
    Command that asks the engine to present categories and choose one.
    SelectPlayerCountCommand
    Command to select how many players will participate in the current game.
    SelectQuestionCommand
    Command that prompts the engine to select a question for the current category.
    StartGameCommand
    Command to start the gameplay loop.
    XMLParserAdaptee
    XML parser implementation that reads question items from an XML document and converts them into Question instances.
